ygData.subject: Howdy all!
ygData.msgSnippet: It s been awhile since I ve made a post here, things look to be going very well =) I m glad to see that this board is working out to what it should be! In the
ygData.messageBody:
It's been awhile since I've made a post here,
things look to be going very well =) I'm glad to see
that this board is working out to what it should be!
In the next few days I will be updating my photo
album to have some new pics! The ones there are
soooooooo old, I haven't used banded armor for at least
five months now. I'm sorting out the good pics now.
Got some neat ones in there, even a few from the
Plane of Hate! See you all in game!<br><br>Kaylin
Danmor, 50th Bard, Mithaniel Marr server
